ygData.subject: RE: New to the trade...
ygData.msgSnippet: I go by the prices posted in the Smith s union.  Here is the URL http://home.earthlink.net/~sblack9/Blacksmiths.htm ... From: Runepuck
ygData.messageBody:
I go by the prices posted in the Smith's union. Here is the URL
http://home.earthlink.net/~sblack9/Blacksmiths.htm

-----Original Message-----
From: Runepuck [mailto:runepuck@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 03, 1999 11:25 AM
To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] New to the trade...


From: Runepuck <runepuck@...>

Hello all. I'm new to the trade of smithing and would like some info on
what to sell the pieces for. I've seen some radically different prices and
would like a general concensus of going rates.

Also, I've heard that you can now forge weapons. What skill is needed for
them and what supplies?

Thank you for your time,
Cyrodane of Tarew Marr
